node.detail_zh: 患者為第 130 宗患者的父親，最近沒有外遊，亦沒有出現病徵。
node.detail_en: He is the father of patient case 130.   He recently has no travel history and he is not showing any symptoms.
node.classification_zh: 輸入個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: iPlace, Castle Peak Road, Kwai Chung
node.remarks_zh: 患者過往健康良好，最近沒有外遊，為第 130 個案患者父親
node.remarks_en: Patient has good past health, no recent travel history and is the father of patient no 130.

node.remarks_zh: 患者沒有出現病徵，其深喉唾液樣本證實對病毒呈陽性反應，已被安排入院接受治療
node.remarks_en: Patient is asymptomatic, his deep throat saliva specimen was tested positive for coronavirus and has been arranged for management at PMH.
